languages.text: "Властью, дарованной мне священной Экклезиархией, и именем Бога-Императора я объявляю священную охоту на еретика, что зовет себя Немезитом!"
"By the power vested in me by the Holy Ecclesiarchy and in the name of the God-Emperor, I hereby sanction a sacred hunt be performed in pursuit of the heretic who calls himself Nemesite!"
languages.original_text: "Властью, дарованной мне священной Экклезиархией, и именем Бога-Императора я объявляю священную охоту на еретика, что зовет себя Немезитом!"

traits.locale_text: "By the power vested in me by the Holy Ecclesiarchy and in the name of the God-Emperor, I hereby sanction a sacred hunt for the heretic who calls himself Nemesite!"
"By the power vested in me by the Holy Ecclesiarchy and in the name of the God-Emperor, I hereby sanction a sacred hunt for the heretic who calls himself Nemesite!"
"By the power vested in me by the Holy Ecclesiarchy and in the name of the God-Emperor, I hereby sanction a sacred hunt be performed in pursuist of the heretic who calls himself Nemesite!"
"By the power vested in me by the Holy Ecclesiarchy and in the name of the God-Emperor, I hereby sanction a sacred hunt be performed in pursuist of the heretic who calls himself Nemesite!"
"By the power vested in me by the Holy Ecclesiarchy and in the name of the God-Emperor, I hereby sanction a sacred hunt be performed in pursuit of the heretic who calls himself Nemesite!"
"By the power vested in me by the Holy Ecclesiarchy and in the name of the God-Emperor, I hereby sanction a sacred hunt be performed in pursuit of the heretic who calls himself Nemesite!"
"By the power vested in me by the Holy Ecclesiarchy and in the name of the God-Emperor, I hereby sanction a sacred hunt be performed in pursuit of the heretic who calls himself Nemesite!"
"By the power vested in me by the Holy Ecclesiarchy and in the name of the God-Emperor, I hereby sanction a sacred hunt be performed in pursuit of the heretic who calls himself Nemesite!"

languages.text: "Kraft der Macht, die mir von der Heiligen Ekklesiarchie verliehen wurde, bewillige ich hiermit im Namen des Gottimperators eine heilige Jagd auf den Ketzer, der sich selbst Nemesit nennt!"
languages.original_text: "By the power vested in me by the Holy Ecclesiarchy and in the name of the God-Emperor, I hereby sanction a sacred hunt be performed in pursuit of the heretic who calls himself Nemesite!"

traits.locale_text: "Kraft der Macht, die mir von der Heiligen Ekklesiarchie verliehen wurde, bewillige ich hiermit im Namen des Gottimperators eine heilige Jagd auf den Ketzer, der sich selbst Nemesit nennt!"

languages.text: « Par les pouvoirs qui me sont conférés par la Sainte Ecclésiarchie, et au nom de l'Empereur-Dieu, j'autorise l'ouverture d'une chasse sacrée à la poursuite de l'hérétique qui se fait appeler Némésite ! »
languages.original_text: "By the power vested in me by the Holy Ecclesiarchy and in the name of the God-Emperor, I hereby sanction a sacred hunt be performed in pursuit of the heretic who calls himself Nemesite!"

traits.locale_text: « Par les pouvoirs qui me sont conférés par la Sainte Ecclésiarchie, et au nom de l'Empereur-Dieu, j'autorise l'ouverture d'une chasse sacrée à la poursuite de l'hérétique qui se fait appeler Némésite ! »

languages.text: «Por el poder que me ha sido concedido por la Santa Eclesiarquía y en nombre del Dios Emperador, ¡ordeno que se lleve a cabo una cacería sagrada en busca del hereje que se hace llamar Nemesitio!».
languages.original_text: "By the power vested in me by the Holy Ecclesiarchy and in the name of the God-Emperor, I hereby sanction a sacred hunt be performed in pursuit of the heretic who calls himself Nemesite!"

traits.locale_text: «Por el poder que me ha sido concedido por la Santa Eclesiarquía y en nombre del Dios Emperador, ¡ordeno que se lleve a cabo una cacería sagrada en busca del hereje que se hace llamar Nemesitio!».

languages.text: 「聖なる帝国聖教会より与えられた権限により、そして神帝陛下の名において、ここにネメサイトを名乗る異端者を追う神聖な狩りの実施を許可する！」
languages.original_text: "By the power vested in me by the Holy Ecclesiarchy and in the name of the God-Emperor, I hereby sanction a sacred hunt be performed in pursuit of the heretic who calls himself Nemesite!"

traits.locale_text: 「聖なる帝国聖教会より与えられた権限により、そして神帝陛下の名において、ここにネメサイトを名乗る異端者を追う神聖な狩りの実施を許可する！」

languages.text: “以神圣国教赋予我的权力，以神皇之名！我在此批准，对自称‘涅墨斯特’的异端分子进行神圣追捕！”
languages.original_text: "By the power vested in me by the Holy Ecclesiarchy and in the name of the God-Emperor, I hereby sanction a sacred hunt be performed in pursuit of the heretic who calls himself Nemesite!"

traits.locale_text: “以神圣国教赋予我的权力，以神皇之名！我在此批准，对自称‘涅墨斯特’的异端分子进行神圣追捕！”

languages.text: "Tanrı İmparator adına Kutsal Ekleşiarşi tarafından bana devredilen güçle kendine Nemezit diyen o kâfiri aramak için kutsal bir avın uygulamaya konmasını onaylıyorum."
languages.original_text: "By the power vested in me by the Holy Ecclesiarchy and in the name of the God-Emperor, I hereby sanction a sacred hunt be performed in pursuit of the heretic who calls himself Nemesite!"
